power.title: Agonizing Assault
power.fluff: Your attack hits your adversary in a sensitive area, causing it to reel in pain

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is in pain (save ends).

section.name: Flail:
section.text: The target is also knocked prone.
While it is in pain, the target is both dazed and immobilized.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Flail:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Bare-Knuckled Rebuke
power.fluff: Your enemies leave themselves open to your powerful punches when they miss with their attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Bare-Knuckled Rebuke stance.
While in the stance, you can use the Rebuke Punch attack at-will.

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a hand free.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within your unarmed reach misses you with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (unarmed)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (unarmed) + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the start of its next turn.

power.title: Basic Techniques
power.fluff: You have focused your training on improving the effectiveness of your simpler attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until you take a long rest, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls with basic attacks and Fighter attacks.

section.name: Arena Training:
section.text: While you are not wearing heavy armor, you also gain a +1 bonus to Will.

section.name: Battlerager Training:
section.text: Your number of healing surges also increases by 1.

section.name: Brawler Training:
section.text: While you wield a weapon in your primary hand and your off hand is either free or grabbing a creature, you also gain a +1 bonus to Reflex.

section.name: Duelist Training:
section.text: You also gain a +1 bonus to speed when you are not wearing heavy armor. This does not stack with your regular benefit from Duelist Training if a Fighter attack allows you to move or shift your speed.

section.name: Reaver Training:
section.text: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls instead.

section.name: Shieldbearer Training:
section.text: While you are wielding a shield, you also gain a +1 bonus to Will.

section.name: Tempest Training:
section.text: Whenever you make an attack with both weapons during the same turn, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

power.title: Bedeviling Assault
power.fluff: While your ally distracts your opponent, you attempt to land yet another blow

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You gain a +4 bonus to the first triggered attack roll you make against the target before the end of the encounter.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, once per round when an ally hits the target with a melee attack, you can make a melee basic attack with combat advantage against the target as a free reaction.

power.title: Brazen Assault
power.fluff: Relying on your own resilience, you put yourself in danger, knowing that you can maneuver for a better attack

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain resist to all damage equal to 5 + one-half the number of healing surges you have expended, but grant combat advantage to all attacks. This lasts until the end of the encounter. You can end this effect as a free action during your turn, but not on the same turn that you activated it.

power.title: Brutal Advance
power.fluff: After throwing your enemy back, you charge to deliver the killing blow

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push the target 3 squares, and then charge it.
If this charge attack hits, the target falls prone.

power.title: Cometfall Charge
power.fluff: You leap through the air toward your foe, landing with a resounding crunch

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Athletics.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You charge and use this attack in place of a melee basic attack. If an effect allows you to charge, you can use this power.
During the charge movement, you must make an Athletics check to long jump. You are considered to have a running start for this jump.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
If you end the jump in reach of the target, you can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20
For each square beyond 2 you jumped, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If you jumped down from higher elevation during the charge, the attack deals an additional +1[W] damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Crack the Shell
power.fluff: Seeing an opportunity, you strike your foe hard and fast, delivering a painful bleeding wound that hampers its defenses

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is painfully bleeding (save ends).
While it is bleeding, the target takes ongoing 5 damage and a -2 penalty to AC and Reflex.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target has a -2 penalty to AC against the first attack targeting AC made against it before the end of your next turn, and you regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Crashing Assault
power.fluff: Your opponent flies back from your attack and crashes into other foes, sending them staggering

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares and knock it prone.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: Push 4 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
You push each enemy adjacent to the target 1 square, or 2 squares if the attack was a critical hit.

power.title: Crushing Foot
power.fluff: You grab your foe and smash it to the ground, placing your foot on its neck to keep the creature down

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Until the end of the encounter, the target cannot move on its turn if it started that turn grabbed by you.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You knock the target prone.
Until the end of the encounter, the target has -4 penalty to escape checks when it is prone.

power.title: Dancing Defense
power.fluff: Each time your blade connects you strike again - or feint, allowing you to dance away

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
You can remain in the stance if you stop wielding two melee weapons, but you cannot gain any benefit from it until you are again wielding two melee weapons.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Dancing Defense stance.

While in the stance, once per round when you hit with an attack using your main weapon, you can choose one of the following two benefits. The effect is considered to be part of resolving the hit of the triggering attack.
► You make a melee basic attack with your off-hand weapon against a different target.
► You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the start of your next turn, and shift 1 square.

power.title: Dervish's Challenge
power.fluff: You hold your weapons close to your body, prepared to strike out when an enemy leaves you an opening

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
You can remain in the stance if you stop wielding two melee weapons, but you cannot gain any benefit from it until you are again wielding two melee weapons.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Dervish's Challenge stance.

While in the stance, whenever you make a melee basic attack with your main weapon as an immediate action or an opportunity action, you can make a melee basic attack with your off-hand weapon against the same creature as a free reaction.

power.title: Dizzying Blow
power.fluff: You croack your foe upside the head, causing it to see stars

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dizzied (save ends).

While dizzied, the target is slowed, takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls and cannot score critical hits. It also treats all creatures as enemies and must take any triggered actions whenever it gets the chance.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Hounding Longarm
power.fluff: With a sharp jab, you shove your enemy backward, continuing to guard against him with your polearm

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a reach weapon.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Polearm:
section.text: You deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Spear:
section.text: You deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:
► The target triggers your enforce challenge even if it isn't marked by you and is 1 square outside your reach.
► When you use enforce challenge against the target, you can shift 1 square before making the attack.
► Each time the target either shifts or makes an attack that doesn't target you and is more than 1 square outside your reach, you can use an opportunity reaction to shift 1 square.

power.title: Nimble Bladestorm
power.fluff: Your weapon becomes a whirlwind around you, striking so fast that your enemies have little chance to dodge

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst you can see

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Light Blade, Heavy Blade, or Spear:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Pinning Smash
power.fluff: You pummel your opponent, knocking it down to one knee and holding it down

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature adjacent to you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier + one-half the number of healing surges you have expended damage.
The target is immoblized until the end of your next turn, or until you are not adjacent to it, whichever lasts longer.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: You knock the target prone. It must succeed on a saving throw to stand from prone while it remains immobilized.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn, or until you are not adjacent to it, whichever comes first.

power.title: Rain of Steel
power.fluff: You constantly swing your weapon about, slashing and bludgeoning into nearby foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Rain of Steel stance.
Until the stance ends, as long as you are able to take opportunity actions, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage.

power.title: Relentless Pressure
power.fluff: Jabbing and pushing with your shield, you force your foe into using rudimentary tactics

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the only attacks the target can make are basic attacks.
Until the end of the encounter, whenever you make an attack against the target, the only attacks it can make until the end of your following turn are basic attacks.

power.title: Spinning Razor Strike
power.fluff: You move with such alacrity that your enemies can't follow your movements: strike, step, strike, step, and finally one last combined strike to end your opponents' threat

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square, or 2 squares if the primary attack was a miss.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: One creature other than the primary target

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength +1 vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square, or 2 squares if the secondary attack was a miss.

section.name: Tertiary Target:
section.text: One creature other than the primary or secondary target

section.name: Tertiary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC, two attacks (main weapon and off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Subtle Cut
power.fluff: You deftly maneuver to precisely cut your foe, drawing its blood and slowing it with suffering

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a Light Blade.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can shift 1 square.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is painfully bleeding (save ends).
While bleeding, the target is slowed and takes ongoing damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
If the attack was a critical hit or bloodied the target, it takes a -3 penalty to the first saving throw it makes to end this effect.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and half the ongoing damage (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can shift 1 square.

power.title: Unexpected Shield Bash
power.fluff: As your opponent guards against the relentless fury of your weapon, you surprise them all with a shield attack that shows them you mean business

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength +3 vs. Reflex

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Strength +6

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d10 + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you mark each enemy within 6 squares of you who can see you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: Additional +2d10 damage.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Additional +3d10 damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you mark each enemy within 3 squares of you who can see you until the end of your next turn.
